00022 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Confirmation extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Default {
00023 
00032         public function render($gp,$errors) {
00033                 
00034                 //set GET/POST parameters
00035                 $this->gp = $gp;
00036                 
00037                 //set template
00038                 $this->template = $this->subparts['template'];
00039                 
00040                 //set settings
00041                 $this->settings = $this->parseSettings();
00042                 
00043                 #print_r($this->settings);
00044                 
00045                 //set language file
00046                 if(!$this->langFile) {
00047                         $this->readLangFile();
00048                 }
00049                 
00050                 //fill Typoscript markers
00051                 if(is_array($this->settings['markers.'])) {
00052                         $this->fillTypoScriptMarkers();
00053                 }
00054 
00055                 //fill default markers
00056                 $this->fillDefaultMarkers();
00057                 
00058                 //fill value_[fieldname] markers
00059                 $this->fillValueMarkers();
00060                 
00061                 //fill LLL:[language_key] markers
00062                 $this->fillLangMarkers();
00063                 
00064                 $markers = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::substituteIssetSubparts($this->template);
00065                 $this->template = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($this->template, $markers);
00066 
00067                 //remove markers that were not substituted
00068                 $content = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::removeUnfilledMarkers($this->template);
00069                 
00070                 return $this->pi_wrapInBaseClass($content);
00071         }
00072         
00083         protected function fillDefaultMarkers() {
00084                 parent::fillDefaultMarkers();
00085                 if($this->settings['formValuesPrefix']) {
00086                         $params[$this->settings['formValuesPrefix']] = $this->gp;
00087                 } else {
00088                         $params = $this->gp;
00089                 }
00090                 $params['type'] = 98;
00091                 $markers['###PRINT_LINK###'] = $this->cObj->getTypolink("Print",$GLOBALS['TSFE']->id,$params);
00092                 unset($params['type']);
00093                 if($this->settings['formValuesPrefix']) {
00094                         $params[$this->settings['formValuesPrefix']]['renderMethod'] = "pdf";
00095                 } else {
00096                         $params['renderMethod'] = "pdf";
00097                 }
00098                 $markers['###PDF_LINK###'] = $this->cObj->getTypolink("Save as PDF",$GLOBALS['TSFE']->id,$params);
00099                 if($this->settings['formValuesPrefix']) {
00100                         $params[$this->settings['formValuesPrefix']]['renderMethod'] = "csv";
00101                 } else {
00102                         $params['renderMethod'] = "csv";
00103                 }
00104                 $markers['###CSV_LINK###'] = $this->cObj->getTypolink("Save as CSV",$GLOBALS['TSFE']->id,$params);
00105                 $this->template = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($this->template, $markers);
00106         }
00107 }
